TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GZipStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: 提供用于压缩和解压缩流的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to compress and decompress streams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示 gzip 数据格式，这用于无损文件压缩和解压缩的行业标准算法。This class represents the gzip data format, which uses an industry-standard algorithm for lossless file compression and decompression. 格式包括一个用于检测数据损坏的循环冗余校验值。The format includes a cyclic redundancy check value for detecting data corruption. Gzip 数据格式使用相同的算法为类，但可以进行扩展以使用其他压缩格式。The gzip data format uses the same algorithm as the class, but can be extended to use other compression formats. 格式可以轻松实现未涵盖的专利的方式。The format can be readily implemented in a manner not covered by patents. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、类压缩使用 zlib 库。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class uses the zlib library for compression. 因此，它提供更好的压缩算法，并且在大多数情况下，比它更小压缩的文件提供.NET Framework 的早期版本。As a result, it provides a better compression algorithm and, in most cases, a smaller compressed file than it provides in earlier versions of the .NET Framework. 压缩写入扩展名为.gz 的文件的对象可以使用许多常用的压缩工具进行解压缩; 但是，此类不本质上是提供用于添加文件到或从 zip 存档中提取文件的功能。Compressed objects written to a file with an extension of .gz can be decompressed using many common compression tools; however, this class does not inherently provide functionality for adding files to or extracting files from zip archives. 中的压缩功能和以流的形式公开。The compression functionality in and is exposed as a stream. 基于逐字节地读取数据，因此不可能进行多轮验证来确定压缩整个文件或较大的数据块的最佳方法。Data is read on a byte-by-byte basis, so it is not possible to perform multiple passes to determine the best method for compressing entire files or large blocks of data. 和未压缩的数据源，最好使用类。The and classes are best used on uncompressed sources of data. 如果已压缩源数据，使用这些类实际上可能增加流的大小。If the source data is already compressed, using these classes may actually increase the size of the stream. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来压缩和解压缩文件的目录。The following example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a directory of files. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/CS/gziptest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/VB/gziptest.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你想要指定压缩效率或速度是否更重要的实例时使用此构造函数类。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class. 此构造函数重载使用的压缩模式。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要压缩模式设置为另一个值，使用或重载。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在创建时设置压缩级别对象。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/vb/program1.vb#1)]

param.span: 压缩或解压缩后的数据被写入的流。

span.span: The stream the compressed or decompressed data is written to.

param.name: mode
param.span: 指示是要压缩还是解压缩流的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to compress or decompress the stream.

summary.span: 用指定的流和压缩模式初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，拥有基础流，因此关闭`stream`参数也会关闭基础流。By default, owns the underlying stream, so closing the `stream` parameter also closes the underlying stream. 请注意，基础流的状态可能会影响该流的可用性。Note that the state of the underlying stream can affect the usability of the stream. 此外，任何显式检查会不进行，因此没有其他引发异常时创建的新实例。Also, no explicit checks are performed, so no additional exceptions are thrown when the new instance is created. 实例时，如果类创建与`mode`参数等于`Compress`和任何进一步的操作发生，流将显示为一个有效的压缩文件。If an instance of the class is created with the `mode` parameter equal to `Compress` and no further action occurs, the stream will appear as a valid, empty compressed file. 默认情况下，压缩级别设置为压缩模式时。By default, the compression level is set to when the compression mode is . ## Examples 下面的示例初始化的新实例类，该类具有`mode`设置为。The following example initializes a new instance of the class with `mode` set to . 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/CS/gziptest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/VB/gziptest.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你想要指定压缩效率或速度是否更重要的实例时使用此构造函数类，以及是否释放之后打开流对象对象。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class, and whether to leave the stream object open after disposing the object. 此构造函数重载使用的压缩模式。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要压缩模式设置为另一个值，使用或重载。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在创建时设置压缩级别对象以及如何打开流。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object and how to leave the stream open. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/vb/program2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，拥有基础流，因此关闭`stream`参数也会关闭基础流。By default, owns the underlying stream, so closing the `stream` parameter also closes the underlying stream. 请注意，基础流的状态可能会影响该流的可用性。Note that the state of the underlying stream can affect the usability of the stream. 此外，任何显式检查会不进行，因此没有其他引发异常时创建的新实例。Also, no explicit checks are performed, so no additional exceptions are thrown when the new instance is created. 实例时，如果类创建与`mode`参数等于`Compress`和任何进一步的操作发生，流将显示为一个有效的压缩文件。If an instance of the class is created with the `mode` parameter equal to `Compress` and no further action occurs, the stream will appear as a valid, empty compressed file. 默认情况下，压缩级别设置为压缩模式时。By default, the compression level is set to when the compression mode is .

summary.span: 开始异步读操作。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous read operation.

summary.span: （请考虑改用 方法。）

span.span: (Consider using the method instead.)

returns.span: 表示异步读取操作（可能仍处于挂起状态）的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the asynchronous read operation, which could still be pending.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以使用执行异步读取的操作方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous read operations by using the method. 方法是在中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支持旧版代码; 但是，你可以通过来实现异步 I/O 操作更轻松地使用新的异步方法。The method is still available in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . 传递返回到值以确定已读取的字节数并释放用于进行读取的操作系统资源的流的方法。Pass the return value to the method of the stream to determine how many bytes were read and to release operating system resources used for reading. 你可完成此操作通过使用相同的代码调用或传递给回调。You can do this either by using the same code that called or in a callback passed to . 异步读取或写入时，会发出，未完成 I/O 操作时，将更新流中的当前位置。The current position in the stream is updated when the asynchronous read or write is issued, not when the I/O operation completes. 多个同时进行的异步请求呈现请求完成顺序不确定。Multiple simultaneous asynchronous requests render the request completion order uncertain. 使用属性来确定是否当前对象支持读取。Use the property to determine whether the current object supports reading. 如果流已关闭或传递了无效参数，将立即引发异常从。If a stream is closed or you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately from . 异步读取请求，例如，I/O 请求过程的磁盘故障过程中发生的错误发生在线程池线程和调用时引发异常。Errors that occur during an asynchronous read request, such as a disk failure during the I/O request, occur on the thread pool thread and throw exceptions when calling . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来压缩和解压缩文件。The following code example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a file. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/CS/gziptest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/VB/gziptest.vb#1)]

exception.span: 尝试异步读取超过了流的结尾，或者发生了磁盘错误。

span.span: The method tried to read asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.

exception.span: 一个或多个自变量无效。

span.span: One or more of the arguments is invalid.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

exception.span: 当前 实现不支持读取操作。

span.span: The current implementation does not support the read operation.

exception.span: 由于流已关闭，因此无法执行读取操作。

span.span: A read operation cannot be performed because the stream is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以通过执行异步写操作方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous write operations by using the method. 方法是在中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支持旧版代码; 但是，你可以通过来实现异步 I/O 操作更轻松地使用新的异步方法。The method is still available in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . 方法会启动到异步写操作流对象。The method starts an asynchronous write operation to a stream object. 你必须创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You must create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 调用受保护方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

returns.span: 仅在流的末尾返回零 (0)；否则将一直阻塞，只到至少有一个字节可用。

span.span: returns 0 only at the end of the stream; otherwise, it blocks until at least one byte is available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以使用执行异步读取的操作方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous read operations by using the method. 方法是在中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支持旧版代码; 但是，你可以通过来实现异步 I/O 操作更轻松地使用新的异步方法。The method is still available in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . 调用此方法以确定已从流中读取的字节数。Call this method to determine how many bytes were read from the stream. 可以一次调用此方法以返回到调用之间读取的字节数和。This method can be called once to return the amount of bytes read between calls to and . 此方法将一直阻塞，直到 I/O 操作已完成。This method blocks until the I/O operation has completed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来压缩和解压缩文件。The following code example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a file. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/CS/gziptest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.GZip1/VB/gziptest.vb#1)]

exception.span: 由于流已关闭，因此无法执行结束操作。

span.span: The end operation cannot be performed because the stream is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，你可以通过执行异步写操作方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous write operations by using the method. 方法是在中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支持旧版代码; 但是，你可以通过来实现异步 I/O 操作更轻松地使用新的异步方法。The method is still available in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . 方法完成异步写入操作以启动方法。The method completes the asynchronous write operation started in the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (byte[] array, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read(unsigned int8[] array, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (array As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer) As Integer
public: override int Read(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ array, int offset, int count);

param.name: array
param.span: 用于存储解压缩字节的数组。

span.span: The array used to store decompressed bytes.

param.name: offset
param.span: array 中的字节偏移量，将在此处放置读取的字节。

span.span: The byte offset in array at which the read bytes will be placed.

param.name: count
param.span: 最多要读取的解压缩字节数。

span.span: The maximum number of decompressed bytes to read.

summary.span: 将若干解压缩的字节读入指定的字节数组。

span.span: Reads a number of decompressed bytes into the specified byte array.

returns.span: 解压缩到字节数组中的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes that were decompressed into the byte array.

returns.span: 如果已到达流的末尾，则返回 0 或已读取的字节数。

span.span: If the end of the stream has been reached, zero or the number of bytes read is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在格式无效中, 找到数据引发作为最后的操作之一。If data is found in an invalid format, an is thrown as one of the last operations. 循环冗余检查 (CRC) 都执行此方法的最后一个操作之一。A cyclic redundancy check (CRC) is performed as one of the last operations of this method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何压缩和解压缩字节使用和方法。The following example shows how to compress and decompress bytes by using the and methods. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/vb/program3.vb#3)]

Public Overrides Sub Write (array As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer)
public: override void Write(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ array, int offset, int count);

param.name: array
param.span: 包含要压缩的数据的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer that contains the data to compress.

param.name: offset
param.span: buffer 中的字节偏移量，将从此处开始读取字节。

param.name: count
param.span: 最多写入的字节数。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to write.

summary.span: 从指定的字节数组中将压缩的字节写入基础流。

span.span: Writes compressed bytes to the underlying stream from the specified byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 写入操作可能不会立即发生，但直到达到缓冲区大小，或者直到缓冲或调用方法。The write operation might not occur immediately but is buffered until the buffer size is reached or until the or method is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何压缩和解压缩字节使用和方法。The following example shows how to compress and decompress bytes by using the and methods. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.GZipStream#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.gzipstream/vb/program3.vb#3)]

exception.span: 由于流已关闭，因此无法执行写入操作。

span.span: The write operation cannot be performed because the stream is closed.
